ClipboardMungerScriptContainer.Title: Filter for tab_crlf grid (Keep)
ClipboardMungerScriptContainer.Description:
Clipboard contains a grid of data, using tabs between colums, and cr+lf between rows. Usually, it is a block of cells (rows+columns) copied from Excel.
User enters a string to act as a filter. Keeps only lines which have the string anywhere in the line.
